about.title: <About Me/>
about.desc1: I’m a developer with a strong interest in web development, especially with React and Node.js/Next.js.
about.desc2: I studied Software Development and I’m currently pursuing a degree in Software Engineering.
about.desc3: I’m always looking to learn, <blue>build new projects</blue>, and explore <purple>new technologies</purple>.
about.desc4: I see myself as <blue>curious</blue>, <red>creative</red>, and eager to <purple>break tradition</purple>.
